testsuite.name: CardGameTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Input the image filename: > notexist.png The file notexist.png doesn't exist. ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Input the image filename: > test\10151rgb.png Image file: test\10151rgb.png Width: 101 Height: 51 Number of components: 3 Number of color components: 3 Bits per pixel: 24 Transparency: OPAQUE ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Input the image filename: > test\10151rgba.png Image file: test\10151rgba.png Width: 101 Height: 51 Number of components: 4 Number of color components: 3 Bits per pixel: 32 Transparency: TRANSLUCENT
